description: These spicy jerk sweet potato fries are baked (not fried!) to a crisp, and seasoned up with a flavor-packed Caribbean seasoning blend!
name: Jamaican Jerk Sweet Potato Fries
recipeIngredient: 2 large sweet potatoes, (about 2 to 2 1/2 pounds total weight)
2 Tbsp. cornstarch, (optional but recommended for crispness)

recipeInstructions.text: Slice sweet potatoes into long strips, 1/4 to 1/2 inch thick. Place into a large bowl or zipper bag. Add olive oil, cornstarch, allspice, paprika, thyme, cinnamon, cayenne, cumin, ginger, salt and pepper. Toss until sweet potato strips are evenly coated.
Arrange sweet potato strips in even layers on baking sheets. Bake 10 minutes, gently flip, and bake 10 to 15 minutes more, until crisp.
Remove from oven and optionally sprinkle with fresh cilantro before serving. Serve with dipping sauce of choice.
